title: Joanna Wiebe: On Accidentally Quitting Her Job & Creating a Movement Around Conversion Copywriting
itunes:author: John Bonini
itunes:summary: Joanna Wiebe, creator of Copy Hackers, talks about her journey toward starting her own copywriting business, which includes accidentally sending her old boss a resignation email.
